summary: This summary examines U.S. Special Operations' plan to spend over $2 billion on a new type of aircraft through the Armed Overwatch program. DOD says this plane will address threats from violent extremist groups. Congress has expressed concerns and delayed funding for this program. We previously found Special Operations hadn't completed its justification for buying 75 aircraft. It has since dropped the number to 62...
title: Special Operations Forces: Summary of Armed Overwatch Reports
